connectionSpecification.title: GCS Data Lake Destination Specification
connectionSpecification.description: Configuration for GCS Data Lake destination using Apache Iceberg format with BigLake catalog

gcs_bucket_name.description: The name of the GCS bucket that will host the Iceberg data.
gcs_bucket_name.title: GCS Bucket Name

service_account_json.description: The contents of the JSON service account key file. See the Google Cloud documentation for more information on how to obtain this.
service_account_json.title: Service Account JSON

gcp_project_id.description: The GCP project ID where BigLake resources are located. If not specified, it will be extracted from the service account credentials.
gcp_project_id.title: GCP Project ID

gcp_location.description: The GCP location (region) for BigLake metastore resources. For example: "us-central1" or "us". See BigLake locations for available regions.
gcp_location.title: GCP Location

warehouse_location.description: The root location of the data warehouse used by the Iceberg catalog. Must include the storage protocol "gs://" for Google Cloud Storage. For example: "gs://your-bucket/path/to/warehouse/
warehouse_location.title: Warehouse Location

catalog_name.description: The name of the BigLake catalog to use. This should match the catalog you created in BigLake metastore.
catalog_name.title: BigLake Catalog Name

database_name.description: The default database/namespace to use for tables. This will be used if the stream namespace is null (when "Destination Namespace" is set to "Destination-defined" or "Source-defined").
database_name.title: BigLake Database

main_branch_name.description: The primary or default branch name in the catalog. Most query engines will use "main" by default. See Iceberg documentation for more information.
main_branch_name.title: Main Branch Name

gcs_endpoint.description: Optional custom GCS endpoint URL. Use this for testing with local GCS emulators.
gcs_endpoint.title: GCS Endpoint (Optional)
